title: Wagerking
author: Wagerking
content: Hey everyone!We are Wagerking - The Powerful Wagering System For Casino And Sportsbooks Rewards , Bonuses And Rakebacks.We Help Punters Reach Higher Level In Their Casinos To Get Level Up Rewards And Bonuses From Them.We Use DICE GAME And Our Own In-House.Secret Strategy Consisting 15 HARD CONDITIONS To Make Profit To You And Also Making You Wager Millions At The Same TimeAbout Wagerking* A DICE Game Based Service Helping Casino Lovers Wager Millions To Achieve Higher Rewards And Level Up - Bonuses.* 15 HARD CONDITIONS BASED PROVEN SECRET STRATEGY TO MAKE TONS OF CASH.* Totally Risk Free , You Don't lose A Dime - THAT'S WHAT WE ARE FAMOUS FOR.* We Play The Game For You Using Our Secret Strategy On Auto Mode In Dice For Around 8-10 Hrs Wagering 100X - TO - 1000X In just A Single Day.* Like Any Other Dice Strategy Out There , You Won't Lose Anything,  That's The Secret. * STRICTLY NO MARTINGALE*WHO CAN USE THIS SERVICE * Are You Looking To Level Up In Your Casino To Get Bonuses And Higher Rakebacks.*Are You Looking To Make 30%-300% In Just A Single Day Of Your Capital Wagering Millions.* Algorithm Based Formula Proven To Make Money Even if 100 loosing Streak Is There.Where You Can Use This* Right Now Our Major Clients Are From Stake Or Bc.game So They Are Preferable.* If you have Any Other Casino Then Mention It Although Our Service Works Only On These 2.* We Also Have A Sportsbook Wagering Program That Suits Big Punters.* Ask Anything If You Got Questions. How To Use This Risk Free / How Can I Trust Your Service First Of All Let us Explain it Briefly, 1.You Give Us Your Casino Account And We Start Auto Bet On Dice using Our Strategy. 2. We Take 40% Of What Is Made Through The Profits Of Dice. You Keep 60% + Your Level Up Bonuses Waits For You. 3. You Can Create New And Anonymous Accounts If You don't feel To Share Your Primary One.4. You Withdraw 40% Profits To Our Account And Keep The Remaining 60 With You. 5. You can Always Lock Your Withdrawals by Enabling Email Code For Cashing Out To Safeguard Your Account. Now Comes To The Demo.....We Are Offering Demos To Reputed Members And Moderators Of This Site.1.You Can Create A Random Account At bc.game and it Will Give You 100k Jb Coins (Virtual Chips To Play)You Handover That Random Account To Us We Show You What We Can Do With Our Secret Strategy.2. After Seeing The Demo , You Can Simply Deposit And Start With Low Till Your Speculation Is Over.3..After Successfully Making You Profit , We Will Request You To Post Positive Comments And Reviews On The Thread.*** We Have Successfully Made Our 30+ Clients Level Up On Stake And Bc.Game  Including 3 Of Them Reaching Diamond Tier Wagering 25,000,000$ ***If You Have Any Questions, Then Drop A Reply Here - We will Try Out Our Best To Answer Your Queries. First Try Then Buy  You can Always Ask For Demo - WHICH CAN BE ONLY GIVEN AT BC.GAME BECAUSE THEY HAVE VIRTUAL CHIPS TO PLAY WITH. GOOD LUCK TO YOU ALL

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: Wagerking on June 26, 2023, 04:54:46 PM* Totally Risk Free , You Don't lose A Dime - THAT'S WHAT WE ARE FAMOUS FOR.My advice is to avoid these platform. Promising no losses is a too good to be true offer and suggests that this is a sort of scam service.- Jay -

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: un_rank on June 26, 2023, 06:42:15 PMQuote from: Wagerking on June 26, 2023, 04:54:46 PM* Totally Risk Free , You Don't lose A Dime - THAT'S WHAT WE ARE FAMOUS FOR.My advice is to avoid these platform. Promising no losses is a too good to be true offer and suggests that this is a sort of scam service.- Jay -It is advisable for forum members to avoid new casinos with too much assurance that you have high probability of winning when we know that in gambling it is 50-50, in physical gamble.While on online  casinos, the house edge will always win. OP,are you saying that your casino will always make customers win all the time. Then,how will you guys make your profit ? How will you get funds to pay customers win because I see that this is a new casino ?

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on June 26, 2023, 06:59:02 PMQuote from: un_rank on June 26, 2023, 06:42:15 PMQuote from: Wagerking on June 26, 2023, 04:54:46 PM* Totally Risk Free , You Don't lose A Dime - THAT'S WHAT WE ARE FAMOUS FOR.My advice is to avoid these platform. Promising no losses is a too good to be true offer and suggests that this is a sort of scam service.- Jay -It is advisable for forum members to avoid new casinos with too much assurance that you have high probability of winning when we know that in gambling it is 50-50, in physical gamble.While on online  casinos, the house edge will always win. OP,are you saying that your casino will always make customers win all the time. Then,how will you guys make your profit ? How will you get funds to pay customers win because I see that this is a new casino ?Well, I basically  didn't want to talk op down or make him feel bad because I'm  not always quick to point fingers but I'm glad others also observed what I also did observed.At first op with everything you've said about your casino especially promising a no risk or loss for players is a big red light to me because that isn't gambling to me and what does  the casino stand to gain if no player losses and to the best of my knowledge,  I know that casinos are into business to make profit and any business that isn't making profits shoukd be a charity foundation..I hope you know that the forum isn't a place to come fool people because you'll  be fished out as soon as possible I now want to advice that, for you to gain the trust of people, especially  from the forum, then you should try building  your account and also get a copper membership to enable you post images to enhance your ANN  if you to intend to make this your ANN.You should also consider getting a reputable member to help you run your ann as that would make things easier for you.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on June 26, 2023, 06:59:02 PMQuote from: un_rank on June 26, 2023, 06:42:15 PMQuote from: Wagerking on June 26, 2023, 04:54:46 PM* Totally Risk Free , You Don't lose A Dime - THAT'S WHAT WE ARE FAMOUS FOR.My advice is to avoid these platform. Promising no losses is a too good to be true offer and suggests that this is a sort of scam service.- Jay -It is advisable for forum members to avoid new casinos with too much assurance that you have high probability of winning when we know that in gambling it is 50-50, in physical gamble.While on online  casinos, the house edge will always win. OP,are you saying that your casino will always make customers win all the time. Then,how will you guys make your profit ? How will you get funds to pay customers win because I see that this is a new casino ?they are not casino but offering service to play on casinos and guaranteeing that you won't lose anything! now, that's a lie. even if they have these 15 rock solid secrets to earn cash, you will still lose some as it is gambling. if they promise you to win and win only, doubt their motive.if their strategies are working, then why not use those strategies for themselves and amass more wealth for them?they don't even provide their site link so everyone can check out..i hope people are not too naive on this kind of offer and be reasonable about it.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: At first I thought it was a new casino and this was their ANN thread only for me to read further and discover that it was only a bunch of words and claims from a random user promising 100% wins if you allow them assist you.Quote from: Wagerking on June 26, 2023, 04:54:46 PM*** We Have Successfully Made Our 30+ Clients Level Up On Stake And Bc.Game  Including 3 Of Them Reaching Diamond Tier Wagering 25,000,000$ ***Funny how you say this without any proof, according to you, you have help or successfully made people win $25,000,000 and yet if I should ask how much you charge each person for your service it would be less than $300. If truly what the Op is saying is true then why would he want to give it out at such a cheap amount? OP we have seen so many type of scams in this forum and unfortunately for you this happens to be one of them, so you might wanna look for another platform that's filled with greedy users to play your little trick of "NO RISK INVOLVED".
